title: cigar box font? help please!!
content:
This may very well be a custom job, but I need the font (or a very similar one) used on this vintage cigar box. please help me?!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131111231328im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cigar113_6680.jpg)
author: maggierc

comments.content: This will most likely be hand lettering. [Letterhead](http://web.archive.org/web/20131111231328/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/) fonts will have something close.

[http://www.fontbros.com/historical](http://web.archive.org/web/20131111231328/http:/www.fontbros.com/historical "http://www.fontbros.com/historical")

http://www.myfonts.com/search?search[text]=Woodtype

Not identical, but some are close.
part of it looks like the Boston redsocks type i know dafont.com has one very close
